summary: I tried making a player home, i failed.
descriptionHtml:
When upgrade to new version, I recommend you remove old version, load game, save without old version and then install new version. Otherwise some npcs wont update package, clutter flies about and other issues.

0.21:
Brüno is very sensitive and got offended by my mean words. We patched things up though and he will once more grace us with his golden voice.

0.2:
Reworked AI. Reworked npc templates. Fixed many navmesh bugs. Little decoration changes. Had stern conversation with Brüno about hospitality. Added bed, see if you can find it.

0.1:
I don't know what happened. There are merchants, all kinds of crafting stuff and a few bandits. Maybe in the next version, I add bed.
author: hazarada
